content.thinking: Let me analyze this document step by step according to the classification workflow: 1. **TEXT EXTRACTION** Looking at the document, I can see it's a Spanish document titled "CERTIFICACION DE PARTICIPACION ACCIONARIA" (Certificate of Shareholder Participation). The document contains: - Header: VP GLOBAL - Empresa de Vigilancia y Seguridad Privada - Title: CERTIFICACION DE PARTICIPACION ACCIONARIA - A table showing shareholder information for V.P. GLOBAL LTDA with columns for: - Names (APELLIDOS Y NOMBRES RAZON SOCIAL) - Document type (TIPO DE DOCUMENTO) - Document number (NUMERO DE DOCUMENTO) - Number of shares (NUMERO DE CUOTAS) - Total value (VALOR TOTAL) - Participation percentage (% DE PARTICIPACION) - Nationality (NACIONALIDAD) The shareholders listed are: - VILLAFAÑEZ PLANELLS JOSE MIGUEL: 49.00% - JABBA GALINDO VILMA LEONOR: 49.00% - VILLAFAÑEZ JABBA JOSE ELIAS: 1.00% - VILLAFAÑEZ JABBA ANDRES FELIPE: 1.00% Total: 386,000 shares worth 3,860,000,000, 100.00% At the bottom it states this was signed in Barranquilla on April 23, 2021, by Katherine Charris Robles, Public Accountant. 2. **PRIORITY CHECKS** This is not BLANK - there's significant content. This is not LINK_ONLY - no hyperlinks or URLs redirecting elsewhere. 3. **DOCUMENT FUNCTION ANALYSIS** The main purpose of this document is to show the shareholding composition of V.P. GLOBAL LTDA company. It shows: - Percentage participation of each shareholder - Number of shares held - Total capital value - This clearly indicates shareholding composition of a company -> ACC Indicative 4. **ISSUER IDENTIFICATION** I notice this document originates directly from V.P. GLOBAL, signed by an internal public accountant. The certification provides an official internal view of the company's ownership structure, demonstrating its authenticity as an internal corporate document. 5. **CATEGORY CLASSIFICATION** The document definitively belongs to the ACC (Authorized Corporate Composition) category. Key indicators include precise ownership percentages, detailed share allocation, and an official company certification of shareholder participation. The document reveals the intricate ownership breakdown, highlighting the company's transparent approach to documenting its corporate structure through an official internal instrument.
